description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Toast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn Toast Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs coriander, chopped roots, stems, and leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Thaw prawn meat and place in a food processor. Add spring onions, coriander (roots, stems and leaves), ginger, sauce, sesame oil, red chilli (optional) and egg white. Process in short bursts until mixture is finely chopped.

Trim crusts from bread. Spread with the prawn paste. Place sesame seeds (or crushed rice vermicelli noodles) on a plate. Press the bread, prawn-side down, into the seeds or noodles to coat. Cut into quarters.

Add enough vegetable oil to a wok or frying pan to reach a depth of 6cm. Heat over medium heat (to test when oil is ready, a cube of bread will turn golden brown in 15 seconds). Carefully place a few toasts into the oil, prawn-side down, and cook for 1 minute. Turn over and cook for 30 seconds or until golden. Drain on paper towel. Serve with soy sauce or sweet chilli sauce.
